collection:
### Collection of Personal Information

We may collect basic contact information such as your email address when you
subscribe to our newsletters or contact us via the contact form on our
website.

We ensure that the collection, storage, and handling of data
from individuals within the European Union are conducted in full compliance
with GDPR requirements.

Queries sent may be stored, utilized to track user interest trends to enrich
our knowledge base with highly relevant content.

Some cookies are necessary for the website to function correctly, while others
help us improve your experience by tracking how you use the site.
sharing:
Agile Coach Pro employs the [Retrieval-
Augmented Generation
(RAG)](https://help.openai.com/en/articles/8868588-retrieval-augmented-
generation-rag-and-semantic-search-for-gpts) technology, which may send user
queries to an external system.

### Data Transfer

We may share your contact information with our data processing partners to
fulfill requests made through our site, ensuring they adhere to strict
confidentiality and data protection requirements.
